[[Deidara]] creates his C2 clay dragon, which [[Sasori]] coats in [[Iron Sand]] with the [[Third Kazekage]] [[Third Kazekage (puppet)|puppet]], also giving it a spiked tail, which it uses to slam on the opponent. It is then detonated by Deidara, resulting in a huge explosion with iron sand.
